short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a link to Instagantt from the Asana project dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instagantt makes awesome Gantt charts out of Asana projects, but it's a hassle to have to open the two apps separately. This adds a link to the Instagantt app from the header of your Asana dashboard!
